summary: Dungeon-delving quest featuring 3 unique interior world spaces and a scripted Boss Fight.
descriptionHtml:
The Secret of Coldwater Cave
by: PixelGrimm

[b]DESCRIPTION:[/b]

Discover a long-kept secret, uncover an ancient evil, and traverse a dungeon guarded by the dead.

[b]INFO:[/b]

This mod adds a dungeon-delving quest featuring a single quest through 3 unique interior world spaces and a scripted boss fight. The Cave lies North of Winterhold.
It should only conflict with other mods that change the exterior cells used by this mod, and may be affected by some replacer mods.
It does NOT require any DLC.

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]

I HIGHLY recommend using a mod manager such as Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for installation of all mods.

To instal this mod manually, simply drag the MODColdwaterCave.esp file into your Skyrim Data folder. Make sure before you play the game that it is checked under "Data Files" when you first open Skyrim.

[b]UNINSTALLATION:[/b]

I HIGHLY recommend using a mod manager such as Nexus Mod Manager or Mod Organizer for uninstallation of all mods.

To uninstall this mod manually, simply remove the MODColdwaterCave.esp file from your Skyrim Data folder. That's all there is to it.Â 

[b]PERMISSIONS:[/b]

Please do not upload this file anywhere, or take credit for its creation.
author: PixelGrimm
